title: [K-12] Metacognitive Monitoring Strategies to Enhance the Effectiveness of Online Video Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of online learning environments and basic instructional methods
context.additional_context: Exploring the Effectiveness of Online Video Learning and Metacognitive Strategy Application in Language Education for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can clearly explain at least three criteria for evaluating the suitability of video content
Learners can improve the accuracy of comprehension judgments during video learning by 20% or more using metacognitive monitoring
Learners can systematically perform elaborative processing of learning content by strategically utilizing the pause function
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
